name: Oasis (itch) (Hajae Ko)
description:
- - - - -

░░ ▒█▀▀▀█ █▀▀█ █▀▀ ░▀░ █▀▀ ░░ 
▀▀ ▒█░░▒█ █▄▄█ ▀▀█ ▀█▀ ▀▀█ ▀▀ 
░░ ▒█▄▄▄█ ▀░░▀ ▀▀▀ ▀▀▀ ▀▀▀ ░░ 

- - - - -

The idea is pretty simple. Move around and get into the blue while avoiding bullets. The twist is that when you move, you can't stop (pac-man-style). And since the bullets are ridiculously slow, the whole game turns into a bullet-hell. It's pretty hard, although I know for sure that it's beatable (I've beaten it a few times while testing).
